attributes.action: Require all MPs to answer questions in a timely and honest way or face removal.
attributes.additional_details: The people deserve answer to their questions. I mean HONEST answers. All we have had is a lot of lies over the years and this must stop for us to have any confidence in the system. The corruption must stop.
attributes.background: Adopt open and honest policies. No more misleading the public with half-truths. A direct question warrants a direct answer; or you will be removed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630638
